strings.GADGET_DESCRIPTION: Watch cricket videos right on your desktop.
strings.GADGET_ABOUT_TEXT:
Google Desktop Cricket Videos © 2007 Google Inc. All Rights Reserved. This gadget fetches the latest videos related to cricket matches from YouTube.com and displays on the desktop.
Click on the image displayed to watch the video.
You can view next/previous videos using the next/previous buttons.
strings.ERROR_FETCHING_VIDEOS: Network error.. Will try again in 30 minutes
